Name.description: The name of the Gismo's .gism file, usually contained within the stage's obj pac (without the .gism extension).

GITextureName.description: The name of the GI texture to use on this gismo, if any.

GIOcclusionTextureName.description: The name of the occlusion texture to use on this gismo, if any.

Extra.value: An object used purely for decoration, E.G. the flowers in Lost Valley.
